title: UniMatch
text: UniMatch refers to a design patented by <a href="Sony">Sony</a> for stereo <a href="headphones">headphones</a>, which allows the cord to end in either a 1/8" or a 1/4" <a href="Phone%20connector%20%28audio%29">jack</a>. This is accomplished by using a 1/8" connector with threading around the base hardwired to the cable, upon which the 1/4" connector can be affixed.
